title: New PhD/Intern Positions Available
content: We are looking for highly motivated PhD students (Spring/Fall 2026) and interns with strong backgrounds in computer architecture and systems, parallel programming, and deep learning to join us.

title: Lab Officially Launched
content: The Sponge Computing Lab has officially launched at HKUST CSE! We're excited to embark on our research journey in efficient, adaptable, and scalable AI systems.

title: Paper Accepted at MICRO 2025
content: Our paper, "ORCHES: Orchestrated Test-Time-Computation-Based LLM Reasoning on Collaborative GPU-PIM Heterogeneous Systems," has been accepted at MICRO 2025.
